div.span: Distance learning is underway for all Roseville Area Schools. Click for more.

div.div: Distance learning is underway for all Roseville Area Schools. Click for more.

div.p: Governor Tim Walz has ordered that all schools will remain closed and distance learning will continue through the rest of the 2019-2020 school year. All other activities and events are canceled through the rest of the school year. Information about your school's distance learning plan is available at isd623.org/covid19.

ul.li: We are providing child care for elementary-age children of health care professionals, first responders, district educators and other emergency workers to ensure Minnesota’s first line of defense against COVID-19 can stay on the job.
School meals are a vital source of nutrition for many students, and we are providing free meals to any child 18 and under during this school closure.

div.class: views-slideshow-cycle-main-frame-row views_slideshow_cycle_slide views_slideshow_slide views-row-1 views-row-first views-row-odd

div.div: Graduation is an important milestone for students and their families. Learn about how we are planning for graduation ceremonies for the class of 2020.

div.class: views-slideshow-cycle-main-frame-row views_slideshow_cycle_slide views_slideshow_slide views-row-2 views_slideshow_cycle_hidden views-row-even

div.div: Roseville Area Schools is responding to the outbreak of COVID-19 in our community. Learn what we are doing in Roseville Area Schools to protect, serve and educate our community and find links to the latest information about the novel coronavirus and COVID-19.

div.class: views-slideshow-cycle-main-frame-row views_slideshow_cycle_slide views_slideshow_slide views-row-3 views_slideshow_cycle_hidden views-row-odd

div.div: We are providing two free meals per day to any student ages 18 and under during this school closure. Visit Brimhall, Central Park or Little Canada from 10:30 a.m. - 12:30 p.m. weekdays, or any of one numerous locations throughout our community. Follow the link for details!

div.class: views-slideshow-cycle-main-frame-row views_slideshow_cycle_slide views_slideshow_slide views-row-4 views_slideshow_cycle_hidden views-row-last views-row-even

div.div: We are providing child care for elementary-age children of health care professionals, first responders, children of educators and other emergency workers to ensure Minnesota’s first line of defense against COVID-19 can stay on the job.

section.class: block block-views five fluid columns alpha

a.strong: Information about COVID-19 and the coronavirus

div.p: Minnesota—like the rest of the U.S. and world—is experiencing a pandemic outbreak of COVID-19, the respiratory illness caused by the novel coronavirus. Learn what we are doing in Roseville Area Schools to protect, serve and educate our community.

As we plan for distance learning, we’d like to know which students in pre-K through grade six do not currently have access to a device such as an iPad, desktop computer, Chromebook, or laptop. We also want to know which students don't have internet access. If you do not internet access and/or a device, please complete this survey.

a.strong: Update about graduation for the class of 2020

div.p: Graduation is an important milestone for students and their families. Learn about how we are planning for graduation ceremonies for the class of 2020.

a.strong: Does your family need Internet access?/ Su familia necesita acceso al internet en casa?

div.p: Does your family need Internet access at home? If so, free or low-cost options are available depending on where you live.

Our distance-learning plan provides students with new learning and sustains previous learning. Our task is to create meaningful experiences related to learning goals and outcomes, aligned with state academic standards. With your help at home, we can make instruction and learning as meaningful as possible.

section.class: block block-views six fluid columns omega

img.style: border:0px none; display:block; height:240px; margin-left:auto; margin-right:auto; width:240px

section.class: block block-block six fluid columns omega

div.p:
Roseville Area Schools | ISD 623
1251 County Road B2 W
Roseville, MN 55113

section.class: block block-block one-third column alpha omega

div.p: We are a unique district with all or portions of seven communities within district boundaries - Arden Hills, Falcon Heights, Little Canada, Lauderdale, Maplewood, Roseville, and Shoreview.
